TopicTitle: cydonia: mars the first manned mission

Articles.Content:
I don't know if anyone remember this game

Game Mission: Our Home, The planet Earth is in jeopardy. Our Continued Existence is being challenged by the Earth herself. Ten years of severe global upheaval has claimed the lives of billions. The Earth has sent a message loud enough for all to hear. And that message is... Change. Humanity's future hinges on the prospect of colonizing another plant. A planet nearby... a Planet akin to our own... A planet like Mars. Surveying the Red planet for the prospect of colonization must begin now. and that is your mission

Anyway, Reason I post here. I was kinda hope someone could make a mesh & texture from game cydonia: mars the first manned mission Lander & Rover. I cant find picture of lander but I still have game... somewhere around here. I'm sure it's collect dust right now.
